name: categories_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hm_hennes_mauritz.
Tool description: H&M API helps to query for all information about regions, categories, products, etc... as on official websites
API description: Retrieves a list of categories from the ASOS API.

country.description: The country code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

lang.description: The language code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint
